thread.title: BRIEF-Melrose Says Urge GKN Shareholders To Accept Melrose Offer

title: BRIEF-Melrose Says Urge GKN Shareholders To Accept Melrose Offer
text: March 9, 2018 / 5:09 PM / in 14 minutes BRIEF-Melrose Says Urge GKN Shareholders To Accept Melrose Offer Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 9 (Reuters) - MELROSE INDUSTRIES * MELROSE INDUSTRIES PLC - “HASTY SALE BY GKN (TO DANA) IS BEING PROPOSED PRIOR TO ANY IMPROVEMENT BEING MADE FOR BENEFIT OF GKN SHAREHOLDERS” * MELROSE INDUSTRIES PLC - “TRANSACTION WILL INVOLVE A LENGTHY AND UNCERTAIN COMPLETION PROCESS, INCLUDING ANTI-TRUST CLEARANCES IN EU, US AND CHINA” * MELROSE - WE URGE GKN SHAREHOLDERS TO ACCEPT MELROSE OFFER Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
